name: Smoke & Mirrors (Rosey)
description:
This game was created as part of a 30 day challenge to create as many games as possible within 1 month and was completed in roughly 5 days. The premise is to solve light puzzles while traveling through mirrors to escape a vampire!

To escape this terrifying Vampire castle, you must solve all of his puzzles! Can you manage to hide from the menacing fiend long enough to escape?
